m_title: Time zone and access from WAN
h_timezone: Select your time zone from the list. You will need to REBOOT your box after saving this data for time to change.
l_wan_port_access: Allow access to the Smart Home UI from WAN port
h_wan_port_access: Open access from port we assume to look in the Internet. If you connect WAN port to your local network and you feel safe to open access from it.
